```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
hiphop <- read.csv("https://www.dropbox.com/s/1qqyshx5ikt9zoc/hiphop.csv?dl=1")
```

```{r}
culture <- hiphop %>% 
  filter (ethnic != "black") %>%
  distinct(subj, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(has_black_friends = case_when(
    blackMove > 0 ~ TRUE,
    TRUE ~ FALSE)) %>%
  group_by(has_black_friends) %>% 
  summarize_at(
    vars(barkley, bieber, boondocks, jayz, monique), 
    funs(mean))

culture %>%
  gather(key = culture, value = knowledge, -has_black_friends) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = culture, y = knowledge, fill = has_black_friends)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") + 
  ggtitle("Do non-black people with black friends know more abut black culture?") + 
  xlab("culture_question") + 
  ylab("avg_score")
```
